trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control and two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> controls that are used to set a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa un tipo primitivo de control que administra la posición y el tamaño de un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> y dos controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> que se utilizan para establecer <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control no tiene valor predeterminado es <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: Su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> se implementa como parte de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> tiene un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control y dos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controles que se usan para cambiar la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> on a slider.
trans-unit.target: La siguiente ilustración muestra un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> en un control deslizante.

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider**
trans-unit.target: **Realizar un seguimiento en un control deslizante**

trans-unit.source: ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb")
trans-unit.target: ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, general")

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: La tabla siguiente muestra la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> propiedades y los correspondientes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> propiedades que se enlazan automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se cambia cualquiera de estas propiedades, también cambia la propiedad enlazada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: La tabla siguiente muestra la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> propiedades y los correspondientes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> propiedades a los que enlaza cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> forma parte de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control y la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> propiedades no se establecen explícitamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: La tabla siguiente muestra la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> propiedades y los correspondientes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> propiedades a los que enlaza cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> forma parte de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control y la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> propiedades no se establecen explícitamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: Además, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> propiedades para la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controla para un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control enlaza con el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> propiedades para la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controla de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> se utiliza para desplazarse por el contenido, el tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control es proporcional al porcentaje del contenido que aparece en el área visible o ventanilla.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: En la siguiente ilustración muestra un ejemplo de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control que implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control**
trans-unit.target: **Una barra de desplazamiento que tiene un control de seguimiento**

trans-unit.source: ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration")
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustración de ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "de ScrollBar")

trans-unit.source: The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente cálculo se utiliza para calcular el tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength
trans-unit.target: Guía = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) × trackLength

trans-unit.source: The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro viewportSize es el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Los parámetros máximos y mínimos corresponden a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> valores de propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la expresión máximo: mínimo + viewportSize es el tamaño del contenido desplazable.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> propiedad representa la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> cuando el contenido se desplaza a la parte inferior.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: Esto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> valor no es el mismo que la longitud o extensión del contenido.

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para una explicación más detallada, vea <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> aumenta de arriba a abajo y de izquierda a derecha en función de la orientación de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: De forma similar, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> aumenta de abajo arriba o de izquierda a derecha en función de la orientación de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para cambiar la dirección del valor de aumento, establezca la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> a `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo definir un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> controlar en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: El área que se proporciona para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea el diseño para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> que se va a utilizar para el contenido <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that decreases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> que disminuye la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that reduces the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> que reduce <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> cuando se presiona <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> que tiene la configuración predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control se encuentra en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> (control), el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controla de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> enlazar a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> styles are defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> los estilos se definen dentro de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> plantilla de control cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> propiedad es <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see the [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo completo, vea el [plantillas y estilos de barra de desplazamiento](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: El índice del elemento secundario.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el elemento secundario de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el objeto de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> en el índice especificado en la lista de elementos secundarios visuales.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: El índice debe ser un número entre cero (0) y el valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> menos uno (1).

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Especificar los elementos secundarios de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Los elementos secundarios se indizan en el orden en que se establecen las propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: El índice especificado es mayor que el valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> menos uno (1).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that increases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> que aumenta la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that increases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> que aumenta <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> cuando se presiona <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> que tiene la configuración predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control se encuentra en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> (control), el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controla de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> enlazar a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> styles are defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> los estilos se definen dentro de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> plantilla de control cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> propiedad es <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece si se invierte la dirección del <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> de aumento a partir de la dirección predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton" /> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton" /> y <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton" /> intercambiaron posiciones y se invierte la dirección del valor de aumento; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> está establecido en `true`, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> lugares de exchange.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> valores aumentan de izquierda a derecha para ambos horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controles.

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> valores vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> aumentar de arriba a abajo, mientras que vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> aumentan estos valores desde la parte inferior al principio.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> propiedad `true`, invierte la dirección del valor de aumento.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> como parte de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control y no establece explícitamente la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad se enlaza a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> propiedad se define dentro de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> plantilla de control cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> propiedad es <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de la propiedad de dependencia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> máximo posible de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The largest allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: El mayor <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> permitido para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es 1.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control se encuentra en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control y la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad no se establece explícitamente, esta propiedad se enlaza automáticamente con la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> valor para un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control es equivalente al tamaño del contenido desplazable menos el tamaño del área de contenido visible o ventanilla.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property is 70.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si el tamaño del contenido es 100 y el tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> propiedad es 30, el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> propiedad es 70.

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Esto es así porque el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponde a la posición en el contenido desplazable que aparece en la parte superior de la ventanilla.

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el contenido se desplaza a la parte inferior de este ejemplo, el 30 por ciento del contenido sigue apareciendo en la ventanilla.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is 70.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> que corresponde a la parte superior de la ventanilla es 70 y el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> valor es 70.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: La siguiente ilustración muestra cómo el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponde a una posición en la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.

trans-unit.source: ![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content")
trans-unit.target: ![Valor que corresponde a la posición del contenido](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "valor corresponde a la posición del contenido")

trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> propiedad para un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> que se convierte en el origen de enlace para el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum" />.

trans-unit.target: Identificador de la propiedad de dependencia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The size of the available space for the track.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño del espacio disponible para la pista.

trans-unit.source: Measures the layout size that is required for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> and its components.
trans-unit.target: Mide el tamaño de diseño que se requiere para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> y sus componentes.

trans-unit.source: The layout <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that is required by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> del diseño que es requerido por <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> mínimo posible de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The smallest allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: El menor <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> permitido para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es 0.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control se encuentra en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control y la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad no se establece explícitamente, esta propiedad se enlaza automáticamente con la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> propiedad para un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> que se convierte en el origen de enlace para el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de la propiedad de dependencia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> se muestra en horizontal o en vertical.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> enumeration value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> que indica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> se muestra horizontal o verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> como parte de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control y no establece explícitamente la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> propiedad, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad se enlaza a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> como parte de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control y no establece explícitamente la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> propiedad, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad se enlaza a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de la propiedad de dependencia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that is used to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> que se utiliza para cambiar <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that is used with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: El control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> que se utiliza con <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> que tiene la configuración predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: The placement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: La colocación de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control corresponde a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control reflects the amount of content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controlar en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control refleja la cantidad de contenido que está actualmente visible.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is computed in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: El tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> se calcula de las maneras siguientes:

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is not specified, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is a fixed default value.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> propiedad no se especifica, el tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> es un valor fijo predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: This is how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> of a Track functions inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Se trata cómo la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> de una pista de funciones dentro de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is specified and the size of the content is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, the following formula is used:
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> se especifica la propiedad y el tamaño del contenido es mayor que el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, se utiliza la fórmula siguiente:

trans-unit.source: ThumbSize = TrackLength * ViewportSize / (Maximum – Minimum + ViewportSize)
trans-unit.target: Guía = TrackLength * ViewportSize / (máximo: mínimo + ViewportSize)

trans-unit.source: Where the parameters are defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: Donde los parámetros se definen como sigue:

trans-unit.source: ThumbSize
trans-unit.target: Guía

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in the same units as the TrackLength.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control en las mismas unidades como TrackLength.

trans-unit.source: TrackLength
trans-unit.target: TrackLength

trans-unit.source: The length of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: La longitud de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.

trans-unit.source: ViewportSize
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize

trans-unit.source: The size of the scrollable area that is visible in the content units, such as the number of pages of a document.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño del área desplazable que está visible en las unidades de contenido, como el número de páginas de un documento.

trans-unit.source: Maximum
trans-unit.target: Máximo

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the content in content units, such as page 10 of a 10-page document.
trans-unit.target: El valor máximo del contenido en unidades de contenido, como la página 10 de un documento de 10 páginas.

trans-unit.source: Minimum
trans-unit.target: Mínima

trans-unit.source: The minimum value of the content in content units, such as page 1 of a document.
trans-unit.target: El valor mínimo del contenido en unidades de contenido, como la página 1 de un documento.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a visual representation of some of these parameters in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: En la siguiente ilustración muestra una representación visual de algunos de estos parámetros en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.

trans-unit.source: ![Viewport size, thumb size, and track length](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport size, thumb size, and track length")
trans-unit.target: ![Tamaño de la ventanilla, tamaño de la posición y longitud de guía](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "tamaño de la ventanilla, tamaño de la posición y longitud de guía")

trans-unit.source: If the size of the content is less than a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> does not appear and the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Si el tamaño del contenido es menor que un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> no aparece y el <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> propiedad de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> está establecido en `false`.

trans-unit.source: The minimum sizes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control are determined by two system parameters, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cambia el tamaño mínimo para un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control vienen determinados por los dos parámetros del sistema, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The minimum size for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> and the minimum size for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño mínimo para un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control en vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> es 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> y el tamaño mínimo para un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control en una horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> es 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> style is defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> estilo se define dentro de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> propiedad es <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> as determined by the position of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor actual de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> tal como lo determina la posición del control <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor actual de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es 0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> represents a value that is between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> representa un valor que esté comprendido entre el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> valores de propiedad.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control forma parte de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control y la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad no se establece explícitamente, esta propiedad se enlaza automáticamente con la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.
trans-unit.target: El desplazamiento horizontal de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: The vertical displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.
trans-unit.target: El desplazamiento vertical de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> moves.
trans-unit.target: Calcula el cambio en <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> cuando se mueve <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: The change in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> that corresponds to the displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: El cambio en <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> que corresponde al desplazamiento de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: El punto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> to a specified point along the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Calcula la distancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> a un punto especificado a lo largo de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> and the specified <paramref name="pt" /> value.
trans-unit.target: La distancia entre <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> y el valor <paramref name="pt" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de la propiedad de dependencia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tamaño de la parte del contenido desplazable que está visible.

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño del área visible del contenido desplazable.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, lo que quiere decir que no se define el tamaño del contenido.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> propiedad se utiliza para calcular el tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controlar en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> no es <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea la sección Comentarios para el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para definir explícitamente el tamaño de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, crear un objeto que se deriva de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> clase y proporcione invalidaciones para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> como parte de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control y no establece explícitamente la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad se enlaza a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control que se implementa en una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control siempre es <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, porque el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control no cambie de tamaño.

trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de la propiedad de dependencia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el número de elementos secundarios de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: Un entero entre 0 y 2 que especifica el número de elementos secundarios en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Especificar los elementos secundarios de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Los elementos secundarios se indizan en el orden en que se establecen las propiedades.
